scripts.build: xcopy  "client" "www/client" /s && xcopy "node_modules" "www/node_modules" /s && xcopy "public" "www/public" /s && for %I in ("config.js" "contacts.js" "server.js" "package.json") do xcopy %I "www"
scripts.zip: yarn clean && yarn build && set TERM=cd www && 7z a -tzip -r ../app.zip *
